About
Ominira

Ominira escrow protocol allows users to exchange different crypto, digital and fiat currencies fast and secure platform. It reduces the risk of fraud by acting as a third party who recieves and disburse funds to both buyer and seller based on set agreements.

How it
works

AgreementBuyer and seller agrees to terms. Either the buyer or the seller begins a transaction.
Tokens PurchaseThe buyer purchases Ominira tokens for fiat currency, and deposits the OEN in an escrow account by using an OTP generated through e-mail, or on the users phone.
Buyer pays Ominiraprotocol.ioThe buyer submits a payment. Ominiraprotocol.io verifies the payment, and then notify the seller that funds have been secured in Escrow.
Seller sends the currencyUpon payment verification, the seller is authorised to send the coin/token and submit proof of information. Ominiraprotocol.io verifies that the buyer receives.
Buyer acceptsThe buyer has a set number of minutes as per the terms to verify the token/coin and the option to accept or reject it.
Ominiraprotocol.io pays the sellerOminiraprotocol.io releases funds to the seller from the escrow account

Secure pear to pear
escrow platform
